isis.stitle: SINGLE REDUCTION, TANDEM AXLES: SPICER J400-S, W460-S - SERVICE PROCEDURES - REBUILD FACILITIES

svcproc.title: REBUILD FACILITIES
svcproc.para: A suitable holding fixture or carrier overhaul stand is desirable (refer to SPECIAL TOOLS), but not necessary to rebuild these units. Alternately, a sturdy shop table of approximately 30 inches in height can be used with suitable means to hold the carrier securely for rebuild operations. A light chain hoist should be used to relocate the carrier housing and to install or remove the ring gear and support case assembly.
